item.description:
v2.5.0

  • feat: Visual indication on success or fail of the transfer
  • feat: Switch between 4 sets of favorites
  • fix: Memory leak on directory list window
  • chore: Move from free + iap to free trial + one-off purchase

v2.4.0

  • feat: Show info in case target disk size is too small
  • fix: Empty folders are not deleted after move
  • fix: Empty folders are not being copied
  • fix: Sometimes can not move files to sub-directories

v2.3.2

  • fix: Sometimes can not move files to sub-directories

v2.3.1

  • fix: Chime sound not played

v2.3.0

  • feat: Close panel with same shortcut as to open it
  • feat: Check for updates from main menu and settings
  • fix: Misleading wording when removing favorites
  • fix: Panel can still be opened when hovering near disabled tab

v2.2.1

  • fix: Settings menu entry shown twice
  • fix: File transfer not working for network drives
  • fix: In rare cases, favorites lost after restart of the app

v2.2.0

  • feat: Drag favorite folders to panel to add them instantly as new targets
  • feat: Allow to add favorites on the welcome screen to get started faster
  • feat: Support right click on folder to open or delete
  • chore: Improved logging for debugging purposes

v2.1.0

  • feat: See progress of file transfer
  • feat: Support for network drives/external storages
  • feat: Beta channel (non-store only)
  • feat: Option to disable quick access to the action panel during drag operations
  • feat: Added option to customize the shortcut for opening the action panel
  • feat: Roadmap to share transparency and encourage feedback
  • fix: Sub-Directory list not sorted

v2.3.2

  • fix: Sometimes can not move files to sub-directories

v2.3.1

  • fix: Chime sound not played

v2.3.0

  • feat: Close panel with same shortcut as to open it
  • feat: Check for updates from main menu and settings
  • fix: Misleading wording when removing favorites
  • fix: Panel can still be opened when hovering near disabled tab

v2.2.1

  • fix: Settings menu entry shown twice
  • fix: File transfer not working for network drives
  • fix: In rare cases, favorites lost after restart of the app

v2.2.0

  • feat: Drag favorite folders to panel to add them instantly as new targets
  • feat: Allow to add favorites on the welcome screen to get started faster
  • feat: Support right click on folder to open or delete
  • chore: Improved logging for debugging purposes

v2.1.0

  • feat: See progress of file transfer
  • feat: Support for network drives/external storages
  • feat: Beta channel (non-store only)
  • feat: Option to disable quick access to the action panel during drag operations
  • feat: Added option to customize the shortcut for opening the action panel
  • feat: Roadmap to share transparency and encourage feedback
  • fix: Sub-Directory list not sorted

v2.0.3

  • fix: [macOS 15] welcome view not usable
  • fix: [macOS 15] settings always show up when the app starts

v2.0.2

  • feat: beta channel (enable in settings)

v2.0.1

  • feat: export logs for support
  • fix: Corrected launchpad name (Store version only)
  • fix: Panel always shows up at center location
  • fix: 4th tile cannot be readded

v2.0.0

  • feat: Grid layout to place favorites
  • feat: Favorites in different sizes
  • feat: Show panel constantly and even pin it to stay on top
  • feat: Hold ctrl key to open the panel while dragging files

v2.3.1

  • fix: Chime sound not played

v2.3.0

  • feat: Close panel with same shortcut as to open it
  • feat: Check for updates from main menu and settings
  • fix: Misleading wording when removing favorites
  • fix: Panel can still be opened when hovering near disabled tab

v2.2.1

  • fix: Settings menu entry shown twice
  • fix: File transfer not working for network drives
  • fix: In rare cases, favorites lost after restart of the app

v2.2.0

  • feat: Drag favorite folders to panel to add them instantly as new targets
  • feat: Allow to add favorites on the welcome screen to get started faster
  • feat: Support right click on folder to open or delete
  • chore: Improved logging for debugging purposes

v2.1.0

  • feat: See progress of file transfer
  • feat: Support for network drives/external storages
  • feat: Beta channel (non-store only)
  • feat: Option to disable quick access to the action panel during drag operations
  • feat: Added option to customize the shortcut for opening the action panel
  • feat: Roadmap to share transparency and encourage feedback
  • fix: Sub-Directory list not sorted

v2.0.3

  • fix: [macOS 15] welcome view not usable
  • fix: [macOS 15] settings always show up when the app starts

v2.0.2

  • feat: beta channel (enable in settings)

v2.0.1

  • feat: export logs for support
  • fix: Corrected launchpad name (Store version only)
  • fix: Panel always shows up at center location
  • fix: 4th tile cannot be readded

v2.0.0

  • feat: Grid layout to place favorites
  • feat: Favorites in different sizes
  • feat: Show panel constantly and even pin it to stay on top
  • feat: Hold ctrl key to open the panel while dragging files
